description:
Kent Ōnarī, a former company employee, was reincarnated into another world as the strongest sage by chance, but he didn’t use his cheat abilities he had been given and lived a self-sufficient life in a remote church.

One day, his older sister ran into his house with three children.

Kent lived with his wife, sister, and the daughters of a mage, a swordsman, and a summoner, as if they were his family.

“Dad, you’re so strong and cool! Please teach Ashuri magic too!”

“Okay. First, watch the spirits’ movements closely…”

“? You can see the spirits???”

“Yes?”

—

“Noah, I killed a big bird! Now it’s going to be bird casserole.”

“Kent, that’s the legendary dragon…”

—

“Papa, Fio, I want to ride Pegasus-sama…”

“Oh, good. I’ll summon anything you want. What color Pegasus do you want?”

His daughters love Kent very, very much.

And—

“It’s like we’re a married couple…”

At night, he spends a warm time with Stella.

This is how the happy slow life of an old wise man began.>
